## Solution Approach for Design System Foundation

Create database schema, MCP tools, and Storybook deployment system for design systems. Enable PSs to create and maintain component libraries with shared ui.153.se/[project]/storybook URLs.

### Technical Approach

This feature will be implemented using the existing tech stack:
- TypeScript

### Code Conventions

- Files: PascalCase
- Classes: PascalCase
- Functions: camelCase

### Integration Points

- API Endpoints (api): REST API endpoints for external communication
- Service Layer (service): Business logic and service integrations
